attributes.title: Destroyed my phone
attributes.review: I downloaded it because I loveeeeee trump but it hacked my phone deleted all of my contacts and wiped everything. I feel violated. Daddy trump let me down 😭

attributes.title: Absolutely awful.
attributes.review: This app crashes all the time the glitches are beyond killing my battery life and I don’t like that it keeps wanting to access my personal info! Please take down!!!

attributes.title: Bad
attributes.review: Hello everyone! Donald Trump is a racist, xenophobic, homophobic, childish person that should not have the power he has in this country. He is not fit to be president or to have much of a public voice. Don’t endorse him by downloading and using this app. 😃

attributes.title: This app killed my vibe🥺✨
attributes.review: This app snuck into my house 🏠 late one July evening 🌙 and murdered my vibe✨😲 it sucked my vibe ✌️into a roomba and yeeted it into death 👻it also stole my shopkins

attributes.title: Hello
attributes.review: NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO NO. Thank you for your time.

attributes.title: absolutely terrible.
attributes.review: The worst app i have ever come across. Not a single part of it works. 0/10 would never ever recommend. It’s complete basura. Complete garboooo. Would never survive in the gulag. Just absolute dog poopoo.

attributes.title: Garbage
attributes.review: Downloaded this and it gave me a virus, and now I can barley use my phone at all, I was lucky to even be able to write this. Please, do not download this app, it’s not worth it!😫

attributes.title: EXTREMELY DISAPPOINTED 😡🤬😡😡
attributes.review: so, i was on facebook taking a buzzfeed quiz on what type of sourdough bread i am when i saw an ad for this SUPPOSEDLY wonderful app. i myself am a rightwing 🙈 , couzin kissin 💋, red blooded american 🇺🇸. so naturally i was inclined to download this app in order to make america great again, and support the orange 🍊 in office, president donald j trump. but, alas! as i clicked download, the app took approximately 365 days to download!! i was furious 🤬 but swore to stay loyal to my president ✨when i finally entered the app, i was immediately harassed by vulgar liberal ads and the chinese government!! together they aimed to steal my information! they even went as far as stealing a small loan of one million dollars from cash app! 😰i earned that money fair and square through my onlyfans account 😡 i am horrified and disgusted!! this app needs to be deleted at once!!!!!1!!!!!11!11 🤬😡
